title: FS: 2 tough front/back combos, 1 is next to impossible!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: 2 tough front/back combos, 1 is next to impossible!
posts.post_content:
PSA 6 Red Kleinow (Boston) Polar Bear, well centered, very sharp card...$1275

SGC 10 Solly Hofman Broadleaf. This is only one of two graded by any card grader. PSA has none graded of any kind. The only other one was an SGC 20 that sold for $4300. Available for $850 delivered..

Please send me your email for pics, thanks...
